programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 25
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 97
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.title: Fantasia
programme.desc: In 1969 Hong Kong, a private detective Man and his two employees, Sam and Fugu, are investigating an adultery case. They track their target into an antique shop where Fugu finds a broken magic lamp. The trio take turns rubbing the lamp but nothing happens, so Man throws the lamp away. At this point a bewitched genie magically emerges from the lamp.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow", a pickpocket who likes to take photos of the people and events around him. One day, a mysterious yet beautiful woman, Jenny, appears in his viewfinder and Kei is instantly attracted to her. Jenny's beauty fascinates Kei, but behind this attractive facade lies a mysterious past and a secret mission...

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Love on Delivery
programme.desc: A delivery boy Yin wants to impress his dream girl Li, so he enrols in a martial arts course to learn strange moves. Being timid, Yin saves Li while wearing a Garfield mask but the credit is stolen by Karate Master, Liu. To prove himself and win Li back, Yin defeats Liu in the ring with his unique martial arts move "Invincible Wind and Fire Spin".

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl", until they meet the fabulous Cherie. The two decide to compete for her affections, but who will succeed?

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fong and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: The lustful Emperor Qi bumps into the beautiful outlaw warrior Wu Yen by chance and the two fall in love at first sight. However, an ugly mark suddenly appears on Wu Yen's face, scaring the Emperor away. This turns out to be a curse by the Fairy Enchantress in order to get between the two lovers...

programme.title: A Moment Of Romance III
programme.desc: Air Force pilot Wai is hurt when he is forced to land in a village during battle. He is rescued and taken care of by Wo, and they fall in love despite the village chief's objection. As Wai returns home for a new mission, Wo comes looking for him and insists to wait for his return even with his death news, until Wai miraculously appears one day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: Dr Yang leads a secret life as Iron Monkey, stealing from the rich and giving it to the poor. Unable to arrest Iron Monkey, the officials force martial arts master Wong Kei Ying to find the masked thief by detaining his son Wong Fei Hung. However, after witnessing the corruption in the government, Kei Ying decides to join Iron Monkey to fight back.

programme.title: Diary
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Winnie starts to regularly write a diary and indulges in her own imagination. She meets Ray who looks exactly like her ex-boyfriend one day and they quickly fall in love, but the relationship soon fades away. Is Ray no longer in love with Winnie or is it just her imagining that he wants a break up?

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: King is one of the best conmen around but is caught out in a scam and gets a five-year jail time when he kills his opponent in self-defence. His wife leaves him with his unborn child, and when King gets out of jail, he goes back to his old ways, only this time, he fights for his family and friends.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: Na Cha And The Seven Devils
programme.desc: While stealing one magical peach from a mystic tree in Heaven, Little Na Cha accidentally drops seven others on Earth, which transformed seven different animals into seven devils. Na Cha must hunt the devils down in ten days or his father will be punished by the King of Heaven. Can Na Cha complete his mission?

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yang's escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own "Eight Diagram Pole Fight" and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin...

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, she's soon framed for her husband's murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense...

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill's nieces!

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: What Price Honesty
programme.desc: In this period martial arts thriller, three police graduates are assigned to a town rife with crimes and corruption. They vow to uphold justice but are hampered by their corrupt superior, resulting in them putting their lives and the lives of their beloved in danger.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master's daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu's beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police's son, blames his father for his mother's death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life!
